original_text: And when Paul was now about to open his mouth, Gallio said unto the Jews, If it were a matter of wrong or wicked lewdness, O ye Jews, reason would that I should bear with you:
korean_text: 바울이 입을 열고자 할 때에 갈리오가 유대인들에게 이르되 너희 유대인들아 만일 이것이 무슨 부정한 일이나 불량한 행동이었으면 내가 너희 말을 들어 주는 것이 옳거니와

sentences.original_text: And when Paul was now about to open his mouth,
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 이제 입을 열려고 할 때,

sentences.original_text: If it were a matter of wrong or wicked lewdness,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 이것이 부당한 일이나 악한 행실이라면,

sentences.original_text: reason would that I should bear with you:
